ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Agreed
ygData.msgSnippet: You re welcome. Giants in Rathe Mountains also drop good loot. XP kinda sucks there but the money is good. luv, -Su ... group
ygData.messageBody:
You're welcome.
Giants in Rathe Mountains also drop good loot. XP kinda sucks there but the
money is good.
luv,
-Su

> I agree... lets drop it. No need to fight, especially over a little
> misunderstanding. I can, however, see how many of you would jump to your
> defenses... I was not aware that there have been a few scammers in the
group
> in the past. Sorry for jumping to conclusions. Oh, and thanks for fixing
> that little problem with the auto. messages, Su. It was getting annoying,
> LOL. To whoever it was that is seeking platnum... although it's very hard,
> you could kill giants in the Frontier Mountains. Some of them drop Forest
> Loops that sell for 300 platnum. However, like I said, it's rare that they
> drop them, but I have looted one from before. It just takes patience,
> although the experience sucks... it did for me anyway.
>
> -= Mippon - 40 Halfling Druid =-
> -= Nevfalath - 8 Dark Elf Necromancer =-
> -= Areznia - 6 Vah Shir Beastlord =-
